A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
After a somewhat disappointing Episode 7\, I was hoping for a big improvement and original story. Only half of the latter came to pass.

Although there were some pleasant surprises with The Last Jedi\, there were far more moments that had me rolling my eyes.

Nothing more is explained of Rey's origin\, Poe remains one one-dimensional\, and some of the new characters suffer from the same trying-too-hard energy as the cast in The Force Awakens.

They play fast and loose with Force abilities\, but that can be forgiven.

Overall\, I can't recommend this one for the theater.
